full_threads.body:
Hi there Allie!

We would prefer people aren't able to see the contents of the site itself, is there a way to set up something like the below? I can only set up a page like:
https://pipinsurance.wolfiq.cloud/maintenance/

But what we are wanting is more like the below (which prevents you accessing the site).

(Ignore the sign up for updates button and the social links)


Please let us know if this is possible and what we would need to supply you.

Megs Hollis | Marketing Manager

Proplab - Powering SGUA & Property Insurance Plus
E:megan.hollis@theproplab.com.au



www.sgua.com.au



www.pi-plus.com.au



The contents of this email (including any attachments) are confidential and may contain privileged information. Any unauthorised use of the contents is expressly prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by Telephone or Email, and then destroy the mail and any attachments or documents.

Hi Sreetheran,

Thank you so much for letting us know! Just confirming that everything looks good on our end, the domain has been pointed successfully, and no changes are needed.

Let us know if anything else comes up, we’re always happy to help.

Hi Allie,

I am getting this error:



I removed the @ symbol and this is the result:



Are there any changes you would like to happen to this?

Sreetheran Nair | Technical Lead

Proplab - Powering SGUA & Property Insurance Plus P: 0863817102 E:Sreetheran.Nair@theproplab.com.au



www.sgua.com.au



www.pi-plus.com.au



The contents of this email (including any attachments) are confidential and may contain privileged information. Any unauthorised use of the contents is expressly prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by Telephone or Email, and then destroy the mail and any attachments or documents.

Hi Sreetheran,

Hope you’re having a great day! Just a quick note with one small update to the DNS setup.

When you have a moment, could you please add the following records?

A Record
  • Name/Host: @
  • IP Address: 162.159.135.42
CNAME Record
  • Name/Host: www
  • Domain Name: pipinsurance.com.au

No rush at all. Just let us know once it’s updated so we can go ahead with pointing the domain.

Let me know if anything’s unclear or if you need a hand, always happy to help.

Hi Sreetheran,

Thank you so much for confirming the DNS records.

No worries, it won’t affect the process, and everything looks good on our end.

Domain verification is now in progress and can take up to 24 hours to complete.

Appreciate you confirming, and just let me know if you need anything else, always happy to help!

Hi Allie,

This is currently the DNS records in the system:



It looks like some things are automatically added to the Name (pipinsurance.com.au) and Content (the dot after app).

Are these affecting the process?

Sreetheran Nair | Technical Lead

Proplab - Powering SGUA & Property Insurance Plus P: 0863817102 E:Sreetheran.Nair@theproplab.com.au



www.sgua.com.au



www.pi-plus.com.au

If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by Telephone or Email, and then destroy the mail and any attachments or documents.

Hi Sreetheran,

Thank you for letting us know.

Just a quick heads up, we're still unable to verify the following CNAME record on our end:

  • Name/Host: _acme-challenge
  • Domain Name: pipinsurance.com.au.kinstavalidation.app

To help us troubleshoot, could you please send over a screenshot of your current DNS settings showing this record?

Once we have that, we’ll double-check everything and confirm it's good to go.

Let me know if you need a hand with anything, always happy to help!

Hi Allie,

I did the necessary changes to the DNS as per the instruction below.

How do I test to make sure it works?

Thanks.

Sreetheran Nair | Technical Lead

Proplab - Powering SGUA & Property Insurance Plus P: 0863817102 E:Sreetheran.Nair@theproplab.com.au

If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by Telephone or Email, and then destroy the mail and any attachments or documents.

Hi there!

We are busy with dev at the moment on - https://pipfeb25.wolfiq.cloud/wp-admin/

Would it be possible to move everything across after COB tomorrow (5pm AWST) so I can tell the developer to stop working on pipfeb25 and start working on https://pipinsurance.wolfiq.cloud/

I did find some relic references to the prior staging site in the header nav and the global settings - would it be possible to triple check these once the switch has happened?

I didn't flag it as it wasn't anything major but just for this one, it would be great if everything is switched across.

For reference the prior staging link in use was -
https://pip-staging.tt123.com.au/
(This was where the original devs built it).

Please shout if any concerns!

Thank you,

Megs Hollis | Marketing Manager

Proplab - Powering SGUA & Property Insurance Plus
E:megan.hollis@theproplab.com.au



www.sgua.com.au



www.pi-plus.com.au



The contents of this email (including any attachments) are confidential and may contain privileged information. Any unauthorised use of the contents is expressly prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately by Telephone or Email, and then destroy the mail and any attachments or documents.

Hi Sreetheran,

Just a quick heads-up, we’ve copied everything from pipfeb25.wolfiq.cloud to the new install.

What I am going to assume is when the time to go live, your team will copy what’s in pipfeb25.wolfiq.cloud to the live site one final time. I was in discussion with Megs about redirection. If I put some paths on the redirection tool in pipfeb25, will that be transferrable to the live site in the copy process?
  • Yes we can get a fresh copy and apply it to the new install.

Just a suggestion, have there been any recent changes to pipfeb25 on your end? If not, we recommend making all future updates directly on the new install, so there’s no need for another transfer before go-live.

Here’s the link to the new install:
https://pipinsurance.wolfiq.cloud/

Let us know what you prefer?

A couple of things to note regarding the new install:
  • Site SEO has been disabled
  • A maintenance banner has been added

DNS Setup for pipinsurance.com.au
To point the domain to the new install, please use the following DNS records:
TXT Record (Cloudflare Custom Hostname Verification)
  • Name/Host: _cf-custom-hostname
  • Value: c4ebd8d4-6437-49b1-834e-e3b6dd02c94e
CNAME Record (for ACME Challenge / SSL Validation)
  • Name/Host: _acme-challenge
  • Value: pipinsurance.com.au.kinstavalidation.app

Let me know if you have any questions or if anything needs adjusting, happy to help!
